TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWithStorageAccount

Docs.summary: The stage of the virtual machine definition allowing to specify storage account.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Compute.Fluent.VirtualMachine.Definition.IWithCreate WithExistingStorageAccount(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Storage.Fluent.IStorageAccount storageAccount) cil managed

Docs.summary: Specifies an existing StorageAccount storage account to put the VM's OS and data disk VHD in. An OS disk based on marketplace or user image (generalized image) will be stored in this storage account.
Docs.return: The stage representing creatable VM definition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Compute.Fluent.VirtualMachine.Definition.IWithCreate WithNewStorageAccount(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.ResourceManager.Fluent.Core.ResourceActions.ICreatable`1<class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Storage.Fluent.IStorageAccount> creatable) cil managed

Docs.param: The storage account in creatable stage.
Docs.summary: Specifies definition of a not-yet-created storage account definition to put the VM's OS and data disk VHDs in. Only the OS disk based on marketplace image will be stored in the new storage account. An OS disk based on user image will be stored in the same storage account as user image.
Docs.return: The stage representing creatable VM definition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Compute.Fluent.VirtualMachine.Definition.IWithCreate WithNewStorageAccount(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the storage account.
Docs.summary: Specifies the name of a new storage account to put the VM's OS and data disk VHD in. Only the OS disk based on marketplace image will be stored in the new storage account, an OS disk based on user image will be stored in the same storage account as user image.
Docs.return: The stage representing creatable VM definition.
